item.title: Friend murdered after being invited to birthday party
item.description:
<![CDATA[1
2
Top News Of The Day
Photos: Raichur murder victim Vishal & suspects Basavaraj and YesuRaichur: A 22-year-old youth was brutally murdered after being invited to a birthday party, following a fight that allegedly erupted over old enmity in Mavinakere in the city on Friday night.The deceased was identified as Vishal, 22, a resident of Zaheerabad Layout. According to SP Arunangshu Giri, Vishal was invited by Basavaraj to attend a birthday party. Another youth, Yesu alias Raju,19, was al...]]>
item.author: Tnn
